FAQs

Plix Collagen Booster

Collagen is a protein that is naturally present in the body & is responsible for giving our skin its structure & elasticity. However, as we age, the production of collagen in our body begins to decline, resulting in the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, & sagging skin. The lack of collagen in the body can have a significant impact on your skin. Without enough collagen, our skin becomes less elastic, making it more susceptible to skin problems. Additionally, the loss of collagen can also result in a reduction in skin thickness, making the skin appear thinner & more fragile. Fortunately, supplementing with collagen boosters can help combat skin problems thereby supporting healthy skin. Read More
